snippet: In “Hello Goodbye Hello,” the British columnist Craig Brown weaves dozens of real-life encounters into a glittering daisy chain that reads like a mathematical proof of six degrees of separation.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews book Hello Goodbye Hello: A Circle of 101 Remarkable Meetings by Craig Brown.
lead_paragraph: In “Hello Goodbye Hello,” the British columnist Craig Brown weaves dozens of real-life encounters into a glittering daisy chain that reads like a mathematical proof of six degrees of separation.

headline.print_headline: From Chaplin to Groucho to T. S. Eliot
headline.main: From Chaplin to Groucho to T. S. Eliot
